outputs.output_descr: By December 31, 2014, (i) Logistical and technical support to the Rule of Law and security institutions, including MOJ and its specialized Bureaus & Institutions, and CSOs is provided in order to increase security and access to justice (ii)  Improved performance of justice and Security Professionals to provide professional justice and security service delivery in the Hubs 1, 2 & 3 regions; (iii) Infrastructure and operational arrangements in place to provide key justice services

project_title: Enhancing  Access to Security and Justice  Hubs 2 & 3
